examples.example: 和朋友们愉快地玩耍了一天后，我们开心地说了拜拜，各自回家。

translate.english: After playing happily with friends for a whole day, we said goodbye happily and went home respectively.

examples.example: 每次和家人分别时，我都会微笑着说拜拜，然后期待着下次的团聚。

translate.english: Every time I part with my family, I will smile and say goodbye, and then look forward to the next reunion.

examples.example: 和同学们结束了愉快的聚会后，我们微笑着说了拜拜，期待着下一次的相聚。

translate.english: After having a pleasant party with classmates, we smiled and said goodbye, looking forward to the next gathering.
